languages.text: Такая мелочь — ощущение чужого дыхания на коже, звук полувздоха... это просто игра нервов, правда? Примерно так, наверное, думал{mf||а} Лорд-капитан, а затем осознал{mf||а}, что практически висит на руках соратников и командира Енхо Сона. Ужас едва не заставил Вольного Торговца слепо бежать в опасную глубь корабля, однако телохранители и соратники исполнили свой долг и защитили сво{mf|его|ю} предводител{mf|я|ницу}.

traits.locale_text: Такая мелочь — ощущение чужого дыхания на коже, звук полувздоха... это просто игра нервов, правда? Примерно так, наверное, думал{mf||а} Лорд-капитан, а затем осознал{mf||а}, что практически висит на руках соратников и командира Енхо Сона. Ужас едва не заставил Вольного Торговца слепо бежать в опасную глубь корабля, однако телохранители и соратники исполнили свой долг и защитили сво{mf|его|ю} предводител{mf|я|ницу}.

languages.text: Those little things — the feel of a stranger's breath, the sound of a sigh — they were simply the result of nerves, surely? No doubt that is how the Lord Captain saw it, but then {mf|he|she} noticed {mf|he|she} was being held tightly in the grip of his companions and Young-ho Sohn. Terror had almost driven the Rogue Trader to run blindly into the perilous heart of the ship, but the others had done their duty and protected their {mf|master|mistress}.
languages.original_text: Такая мелочь — ощущение чужого дыхания на коже, звук полувздоха... это просто игра нервов, правда? Примерно так, наверное, думал{mf||а} Лорд-капитан, а затем осознал{mf||а}, что практически висит на руках соратников и командира Енхо Сона. Ужас едва не заставил Вольного Торговца слепо бежать в опасную глубь корабля, однако телохранители и соратники исполнили свой долг и защитили сво{mf|его|ю} предводител{mf|я|ницу}.

traits.locale_text: Those little things — the feel of a stranger's breath, the sound of a sigh — they were simply the result of nerves, surely? No doubt that is how the Lord Captain saw it, but then {mf|he|she} noticed {mf|he|she} was being held tightly in the grip of his companions and Young-ho Sohn. Terror had almost driven the Rogue Trader to run blindly into the perilous heart of the ship, but the others had done their duty and protected their {mf|master|mistress}.

Those little things — the feel of a stranger's breath, the sound of a sigh — they were simply the result of nerves, surely? No doubt that is how the Lord Captain saw it, but then {mf|he|she} noticed {mf|he|she} was being held tightly in the grip of his companions and Young-ho Sohn. Terror had almost driven the Rogue Trader to run blindly into the perilous heart of the ship, but the others had done their duty and protected their {mf|master|mistress}.

Those little things — the feel of a stranger's breath, the sound of a sigh — they were simply the result of nerves, surely? No doubt that is how the Lord Captain saw it, but then {mf|he|she} noticed {mf|he|she} was being held tightly in the grip of his companions and Young-ho Sohn. Terror had almost driven the Rogue Trader to run blindly into the perilous heart of the ship, but the others had done their duty and protected their {mf|master|mistress}.

Those little things — the feel of a stranger's breath, the sound of a sigh — they were simply the result of nerves, surely? No doubt that is how the Lord Captain saw it, but then {mf|he|she} noticed {mf|he|she} was being held tightly in the grip of his companions and Young-ho Sohn. Terror had almost driven the Rogue Trader to run blindly into the perilous heart of the ship, but the others had done their duty and protected their {mf|master|mistress}.

languages.text: Todos esos pequeños detalles (la sensación del aliento de un desconocido, el sonido de un suspiro...) no eran más que fruto de los nervios, ¿verdad? Es probable que {mf|el|la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} lo viera así, pero pronto se dio cuenta de que sus acompañantes y Young-ho Sohn estaban sujetándole. El terror había estado a punto de impulsar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente a huir al peligroso corazón de la nave, pero los demás habían cumplido su deber, protegiendo a su señor{mf||a}.
languages.original_text: Those little things — the feel of a stranger's breath, the sound of a sigh — they were simply the result of nerves, surely? No doubt that is how the Lord Captain saw it, but then {mf|he|she} noticed {mf|he|she} was being held tightly in the grip of his companions and Young-ho Sohn. Terror had almost driven the Rogue Trader to run blindly into the perilous heart of the ship, but the others had done their duty and protected their {mf|master|mistress}.

traits.locale_text: Todos esos pequeños detalles (la sensación del aliento de un desconocido, el sonido de un suspiro...) no eran más que fruto de los nervios, ¿verdad? Es probable que {mf|el|la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} lo viera así, pero pronto se dio cuenta de que sus acompañantes y Young-ho Sohn estaban sujetándole. El terror había estado a punto de impulsar a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente a huir al peligroso corazón de la nave, pero los demás habían cumplido su deber, protegiendo a su señor{mf||a}.

languages.text: 那些古怪的小事，比如说，仿佛某个陌生人在耳边呼吸的感觉，或是仿佛叹息般的声音，这一切肯定都是过度紧张的结果，没错吧？毫无疑问，舰长大人肯定是这么想的，但没过多久，{mf|他|她}却发现，自己正被宋永和与其他队员死死地抓着。在恐惧的驱使下，行商浪人差一点就盲目地冲到飞船危险的核心区域了，但幸好其他人充分地履行了各自的职责，妥善地保护住了他们的{mf|主人|女主人}。
languages.original_text: Those little things — the feel of a stranger's breath, the sound of a sigh — they were simply the result of nerves, surely? No doubt that is how the Lord Captain saw it, but then {mf|he|she} noticed {mf|he|she} was being held tightly in the grip of his companions and Young-ho Sohn. Terror had almost driven the Rogue Trader to run blindly into the perilous heart of the ship, but the others had done their duty and protected their {mf|master|mistress}.

traits.locale_text: 那些古怪的小事，比如说，仿佛某个陌生人在耳边呼吸的感觉，或是仿佛叹息般的声音，这一切肯定都是过度紧张的结果，没错吧？毫无疑问，舰长大人肯定是这么想的，但没过多久，{mf|他|她}却发现，自己正被宋永和与其他队员死死地抓着。在恐惧的驱使下，行商浪人差一点就盲目地冲到飞船危险的核心区域了，但幸好其他人充分地履行了各自的职责，妥善地保护住了他们的{mf|主人|女主人}。

languages.text: 誰とも分からぬ息の感触やため息の音。そういった些細なことは単に神経のせいだったのか？ロード・キャプテンは絶対そうだと思っていたが、その時、自分の体を仲間やソン・ヨンホがしっかり捕まえていることにハッとに気づく。自由開拓者は恐怖のために、船の危険な中心部に訳も分からず突っ込みそうになっていたところを、他の者達が役目を全うして主人を守ったのだ。
languages.original_text: Those little things — the feel of a stranger's breath, the sound of a sigh — they were simply the result of nerves, surely? No doubt that is how the Lord Captain saw it, but then {mf|he|she} noticed {mf|he|she} was being held tightly in the grip of his companions and Young-ho Sohn. Terror had almost driven the Rogue Trader to run blindly into the perilous heart of the ship, but the others had done their duty and protected their {mf|master|mistress}.

traits.locale_text: 誰とも分からぬ息の感触やため息の音。そういった些細なことは単に神経のせいだったのか？ロード・キャプテンは絶対そうだと思っていたが、その時、自分の体を仲間やソン・ヨンホがしっかり捕まえていることにハッとに気づく。自由開拓者は恐怖のために、船の危険な中心部に訳も分からず突っ込みそうになっていたところを、他の者達が役目を全うして主人を守ったのだ。

languages.text: Derlei Kleinigkeiten – der Atem eines Fremden, ein Seufzen – waren doch bestimmt nur den Nerven geschuldet, oder? Das war mit Sicherheit die Sichtweise des Lord Captain, aber dann bemerkte {mf|er|sie} plötzlich, dass {mf|seine|ihre} Gefährten und Young-ho Sohn {mf|ihn|sie} fest gepackt hatten. Der Schrecken hatte {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} fast dazu gebracht, blind ins gefährliche Herz des Schiffs zu laufen, aber die anderen hatten ihre Pflicht getan und {mf|ihren Herren|ihre Herrin} beschützt.
languages.original_text: Those little things — the feel of a stranger's breath, the sound of a sigh — they were simply the result of nerves, surely? No doubt that is how the Lord Captain saw it, but then {mf|he|she} noticed {mf|he|she} was being held tightly in the grip of his companions and Young-ho Sohn. Terror had almost driven the Rogue Trader to run blindly into the perilous heart of the ship, but the others had done their duty and protected their {mf|master|mistress}.

traits.locale_text: Derlei Kleinigkeiten – der Atem eines Fremden, ein Seufzen – waren doch bestimmt nur den Nerven geschuldet, oder? Das war mit Sicherheit die Sichtweise des Lord Captain, aber dann bemerkte {mf|er|sie} plötzlich, dass {mf|seine|ihre} Gefährten und Young-ho Sohn {mf|ihn|sie} fest gepackt hatten. Der Schrecken hatte {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} fast dazu gebracht, blind ins gefährliche Herz des Schiffs zu laufen, aber die anderen hatten ihre Pflicht getan und {mf|ihren Herren|ihre Herrin} beschützt.

languages.text: Ces sensations éphémères ne pouvaient qu'être une illusion causée par l'anxiété. Personne ne lui avait chuchoté à l'oreille ni soufflé dans le cou... n'est-ce pas ? {name} essayait certainement de s'en convaincre, quand soudain, {mf|il|elle} se rendit compte que ses compagnons et Young-ho Sohn l'agrippaient fermement. En proie à la terreur, {mf|il|elle} avait bien failli se précipiter aveuglément vers le cœur périlleux du vaisseau. Heureusement, ses subalternes avaient fait leur devoir en protégeant leur chef.
languages.original_text: Those little things — the feel of a stranger's breath, the sound of a sigh — they were simply the result of nerves, surely? No doubt that is how the Lord Captain saw it, but then {mf|he|she} noticed {mf|he|she} was being held tightly in the grip of his companions and Young-ho Sohn. Terror had almost driven the Rogue Trader to run blindly into the perilous heart of the ship, but the others had done their duty and protected their {mf|master|mistress}.

traits.locale_text: Ces sensations éphémères ne pouvaient qu'être une illusion causée par l'anxiété. Personne ne lui avait chuchoté à l'oreille ni soufflé dans le cou... n'est-ce pas ? {name} essayait certainement de s'en convaincre, quand soudain, {mf|il|elle} se rendit compte que ses compagnons et Young-ho Sohn l'agrippaient fermement. En proie à la terreur, {mf|il|elle} avait bien failli se précipiter aveuglément vers le cœur périlleux du vaisseau. Heureusement, ses subalternes avaient fait leur devoir en protégeant leur chef.

languages.text: Yabancının nefesi, iç çekiş sesi... Bu önemsiz görünen fenomenler, gerginliğin yarattığı bir yanılsama mıydı? Lord Kaptan durumu böyle değerlendiriyordu ancak yoldaşları ve Young-ho Sohn tarafından sıkıca tutulduğunu fark etti. Dehşet, Hür Tacir'i de ele geçirmişti. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ni koruma görevini yerine getiren sadık müttefikleri olmasaydı Hür Tacir de geminin binbir türlü tehlikeye gebe kalbine doğru yola koyulacaktı.
languages.original_text: Those little things — the feel of a stranger's breath, the sound of a sigh — they were simply the result of nerves, surely? No doubt that is how the Lord Captain saw it, but then {mf|he|she} noticed {mf|he|she} was being held tightly in the grip of his companions and Young-ho Sohn. Terror had almost driven the Rogue Trader to run blindly into the perilous heart of the ship, but the others had done their duty and protected their {mf|master|mistress}.

traits.locale_text: Yabancının nefesi, iç çekmesinin sesi… Bu önemsiz görünen fenomenler, gerginliğin yarattığı bir yanılsama mıydı? Lord Kaptan durumu böyle değerlendiriyordu ancak yoldaşları ve Young-ho Sohn tarafından sıkıca tutulduğunu fark etti. Dehşet, Hür Tacir'i de ele geçirmişti ve {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretlerini koruma görevini yerine getiren sadık müttefikleri olmasaydı, Hür Tacir de geminin bin bir türlü tehlikeye gebe kalbine doğru yola koyulmuştu.
